name: Team, Inc.
description: Team, Inc. is a leading provider of integrated industrial services, specializing in asset reliability and maintenance solutions. Founded in 1970, the company operates across various sectors, including oil and gas, petrochemical, and other industrial markets. Team, Inc. offers a comprehensive range of services, including inspection, maintenance, and repair services, as well as advanced communications and technology solutions. With a commitment to safety, quality, and efficiency, Team, Inc. serves its clients by enhancing the performance and longevity of their assets. The company prides itself on its expert workforce and state-of-the-art technology, ensuring it remains at the forefront of industry standards and practices. Team, Inc. is dedicated to delivering value to its customers through innovative solutions and a proactive approach to asset management, ultimately contributing to operational excellence in industrial environments. The company is focused on sustainable practices and strives to minimize environmental impact while maximizing the reliability and performance of its clients' operations.

seo.meta_title: Team, Inc. | Integrated Industrial Services and Asset Reliability
seo.meta_description: Explore Team, Inc., a leader in asset reliability and maintenance solutions. Discover our commitment to safety, quality, and innovative industrial services.

faq.question: What services does Team, Inc. provide?
faq.answer: Team, Inc. provides integrated industrial services, including inspection, maintenance, and repair solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Team, Inc.?
faq.answer: John W. Wozniak is the CEO of Team, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Team, Inc. headquartered?
faq.answer: Team, Inc. is headquartered in Sugar Land, Texas, USA.
